content: up right side chain 1 single_crochet 11 across top chain 1 join to beg single_crochet with slip_stitch sewing sandwich together side 1 side 2 and the inner sponge - with the sponge in the middle side 2 on top with right side facing out side 1 on bottom with right side fac- ing the sponge your yarn should still be attached if you ended off by mistake just reattach in the same place chain 1 single_crochet around entire edge through the sts of both sides together make sure to single_crochet into the chain 1s on the corners as well if you are using an inner sponge if you are not using an inner sponge chain 1 at each corner abbreviations chain=chain sts=stitches slip_stitch=slip_stitch single_crochet=single_crochet frm=from hk=hook ea=each decrease=together beg=beginning this pattern is protected by copyright please do not sell or redistribute this pattern in any form selling the completed items made using this pattern is not permitted without express permission from the designer
